Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
local keepLooping = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
keepLooping = true
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
while keepLooping do while Tool.Enabled do if not keepLooping then return end wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled do if not keepLooping then return end wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end
keepLooping = true end
function onUnequippedLocal() keepLooping = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local kit = script.Parent local reloadTime = 30
kit.Enabled = true
function onUsed() if not kit.Enabled then return end local vChar = kit.Parent if vChar == nil then return end local hum = vChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hum == nil then return end
kit.Enabled = false
local targetPos = hum.TargetPoint
local playaz = game.Players:GetPlayers() local closestTarget = nil local closestDistanceSq = 100 -- must click within 10 units of person to heal them local closestTorso = nil
for i = 1, #playaz do pChar = playaz[i].Character if pChar ~= nil then pTorso = pChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if pTorso ~= nil then if (pTorso.Position - targetPos):Dot(pTorso.Position - targetPos) < closestDistanceSq then closestTarget = pChar closestTorso = pTorso closestDistanceSq = (pTorso.Position - targetPos):Dot(pTorso.Position - targetPos) end end end end
if closestTarget == nil then kit.Enabled = true return end
kit.Handle.FirstAid:Play()
-- otherwise, we have a target! let the healing begin! local ghostKit = kit.Handle:Clone() ghostKit.CanCollide = false sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") sparkles.SparkleColor = Color3.new(0, 1, 0) sparkles.Parent = ghostKit
newFloatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") newFloatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, ghostKit:GetMass()*196, 0) newFloatForce.Parent = ghostKit
newSpinForce = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") newSpinForce.P = 100000 newSpinForce.maxTorque = Vector3.new(newSpinForce.P, newSpinForce.P, newSpinForce.P) newSpinForce.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 20, 0) newSpinForce.Parent = ghostKit
local newBodyPosition = Instance.new("BodyPosition") newBodyPosition.P = 10000 newBodyPosition.D = 1000 newBodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBodyPosition.P, newBodyPosition.P, newBodyPosition.P) newBodyPosition.position = ghostKit.Position + Vector3.new(0, 10, 0) newBodyPosition.Parent = ghostKit
ghostKit.Parent = game.Workspace kit.Handle.Transparency = 1
wait(1)
while (ghostKit.Position - closestTorso.Position):Dot(ghostKit.Position - closestTorso.Position) > 1 and closestTorso ~= nil and closestTorso.Parent ~= nil and closestTorso.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") ~= nil do newBodyPosition.position = closestTorso.Position wait(.1) end
for i = 1, 10 do ghostKit.Transparency = i/10 if closestTorso ~= nil then newBodyPosition.position = closestTorso.Position end wait(.1) end
ghostKit:remove()
if closestTorso ~= nil and closestTorso.Parent ~= nil then local humanoid = closestTorso.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil then local newHealth = humanoid.Health + humanoid.MaxHealth / 3 if newHealth > humanoid.MaxHealth then newHealth = humanoid.MaxHealth end humanoid.Health = newHealth end end
wait(reloadTime)
kit.Handle.Transparency = 0 kit.Enabled = true end
function makeVisible() kit.Handle.Transparency = 0 end
kit.Unequipped:connect(makeVisible) kit.Activated:connect(onUsed)
